html:
Alta Fox Capital Management, a private investment fund, has acquired 2.5% stake in National Retail Solutions Inc, operates a point-of-sale (POS)-based platform that enables independent retailers to operate and process transactions more effectively for consideration of USD10 million. Both the companies are based in US

National Retail Solutions Inc is a subsidiary of IDT Corporation.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)10
Deal TypePrivate Equity
Sub-CategoryInstitutional Buy-out (IBO)
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-09-29

Deal Participants

Target (Company)National Retail Solutions, Inc.
Acquirer (Company)Alta Fox Capital Management LLC

Deal Rationale

% Acquisition2.5%
